name: Axamit
description:
Axamit is the leading provider of software development and consulting services. We have an exclusive expertise in development and implementation of solutions based on the Adobe Experience Cloud platform (AEM, Analytics, Campaigns, Target). The company is Adobe Specialized Solution Partner and all its specialists have the status of certified Adobe developers.
Axamit has a proven track record of reliability and high performance. One of the reasons for this lies in our ability to accumulate knowledge. We standardize the best industry practices across the company and use the latest management methodologies. We continuously invest in training and education of our people.
Our result-oriented approach pays off since the world's famous brands have trust in us.
Axamit is a sponsor and active participant of the AEM Community in Eastern Europe.
